statement: {D1} Stole {D2}'s wallet!{NL}however {D2} called the police and {D1} received a 100 diamond fine...
{D1} went to {D2}'s house to rob!{NL}then {D1} realised that the door is locked and {D2} is on vacation... better luck next time, {D1}!
{D1} went to the bank disguised as {D2} and stole 500 diamonds!
{D1} managed to reach {D2}'s pocket and found a single diamond.
{D1} hacked {D2} and spread their personal information on the dark web.{NL}{D1} received 1000 diamonds.
{D1} you lost 1 diamond for taking your time to be a criminal.
{D2}'s house got robbed by {D1}. {D1} managed to get 1000 diamonds,{NL}...but the police came and {D1} got a fine of 250 diamonds.
